item.title: How to Build a Serverless API using AWS lambda, API gateway, and DynamoDB
item.description: Build a Serverless API using AWS lambda, API gateway, and DynamoDB.

item.title: About
item.description: I am currently working at as a software engineer contracting for early stage startups. Feel free to have a look at my LinkedIn or Github. I also livestream on twitch Twitch where I build fun stuff with rust(lang) and typescript

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’ve worked on some projects over the years. I will be updating this list soon as I have worked on a lot more projects that those listed here. [Cli Apps] A web scrapper for twitter more soon… [Web Apps] A directory of Top Ai tools for any task: AiToolsBoard A remote job board for africans: Workally A shortlet (AirBnb) apartment booking platform (in-progress) for Africa: Stayzen Web app for posting daily kind acts by anyone anywhere in the world.
